ygData.subject: RE: Crude Stein Spoiler
ygData.msgSnippet: More SPOILER info that I left out. You can get the Noble crests in Innothule Swamp and in Feerrott.  The best way to do this is to auction for one at the zone
ygData.messageBody:
More SPOILER info that I left out.



















You can get the Noble crests in Innothule Swamp and in Feerrott. The best
way to do this is to auction for one at the zone border.
As my 10th level Troll SK, I was attacked independantly twice by even fight
hunters (a Highelf and a Dwarf) in front of the Guk entrance. They dropped
the crest both times.

This SPOILER is cut/pasted from Allakhazam's website.
`
Noble Hunters: Contact Kogna and Guntrik in the warriors guild of Oggok,
you must speak to Kogna first and tell him you are a mighty warrior of the
guild he will mention something about the Noble Hunters of Humans and Elves.
Go find Guntrik, also in warrior guild hall. He will give you the rest of
the quest info. Kill Noble Hunters of Humans and Elves, return to him any
house crests or an item that says where the Hunters sleep and he will reward
you. Your reward is sometimes the Crude Stein.





-----Original Message-----
From: Mark Stokes [mailto:Mark.Stokes@...]On Behalf Of
mstokes
Sent: Tuesday, November 30, 1999 3:11 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] Crude Stein Spoiler


From: mstokes <mstokes@...>

Jenni wrote:

> From: Jenni <freya@...>
>
> So far I've only used it on the Fire Elementals in Lavastorm, I haven't
done a
> lot of experementation with it.
>
> I'm working on getting more CHR items as well, being DE I didn't get a
very high
> base CHR. I think without the gear I have so far my CHR is only 80.
the CHR
> buff I get later will help that.
>
> Another CHR question. I was lucky enough to find a crude stein for sale
on a
> merchant in Feerot, only cost me 7pp and some change. It's not for sale
there
> anymore. I've heard the only way you're supposed to be able to get one is
> through a quest. Does anyone know what quest gives the crude stein? I
see
> people auctioning them occasionally for 30 to 70pp. I could use the
money, so I
> wouldn't mind running the quest to get another one. (too bad they're lore
and
> can only be held in the secondary hand. There's been times that carrying
2 of
> them would have come in very handy.)

Spoiler Below
|
|
|
|
|
|
|
|
|
|
|
\/

Crude Stiens are plain old loot items from Ogre Bouncers. You can usually
obtain
one by heading down there and looking for high level players who kite the
guards.
Since they are lore, you can probably get one for free.
